title: All Access: Mayweather vs. Canelo - Epilogue - Emmy Award Winning Episode

sucks to watch and that was cannelos biggest fight and he wasn't bad. After

undefeated then yeah it's time to fight Mayweather ﻿

better fight and he would've had a chance 'cause Floyd's reach is shorter 
than Lara's...
Hope Canelo gets a rematch and this time he shows up with the proper 
mindset.﻿

Canelo made the mistake of trying to box Mayweather. Trying to box 
Mayweather is almost the same thing as throwing the fight because you 
cannot outbox Mayweather. I would like to see a rematch with Canelo having 
a different approach. I still think Mayweather would win but his game plan 
in this fight was all wrong. There are better technically skilled boxers 
like Andre Ward, Guillermo Rigondeaux, etc. Mayweather is the most complete 
fighter in boxing. He cannot be outboxed. Master of the game.﻿

comments.text:
Fantastic fight! Canelo did very well against such a great boxer. The bout 
was not nearly as one-sided as people say. Canelo held his own, trying to 
fight Floyd at his own game, as a boxer. Not a brawler, not a puncher. He 
had the speed, the footwork, and the courage to test Mayweather. This is 
the most equal fight I've ever seen Floyd fight. Maybe next time young 
champ!﻿
